body: Any ordinary panel in the manga is far hotter than the awful stuff the porn guys usually come up with - not just by accident of their lack of talent or skill, but deliberately by their extremely bad taste (and basic inability to distinguish what's bad and what's good). In a way, they think what looks good has to be changed in order to look really, really bad. Whereas what's good is what is attractive, of course. (The body and character type, and so on.)
